This is one of the single most extraordinary financial trainings ever brought to the public.  Learn how to work differently with banks in order to eliminate all debts, including mortgages, in a fraction of the time.  Prevent up to 80% of interest costs on any type of loan.

items.title: The Purity Myth Trailer
items.description:
Produced & Distributed by the Media Education Foundation
Featuring Jessica Valenti

In this video adaptation of her bestselling book, pioneering feminist blogger Jessica Valenti trains her sights on "the virginity movement" -- an unholy alliance of evangelical Christians, right-wing politicians, and conservative policy intellectuals who have been exploiting irrational fears about women's sexuality to roll back women's rights. From dad-and-daughter "purity balls," taxpayer-funded abstinence-only curricula, and political attacks on Planned Parenthood, to recent attempts by legislators to de-fund women's reproductive health care and narrow the legal definition of rape, Valenti identifies a single, unifying assumption: the myth that the worth of a woman depends on what she does -- or does not do -- sexually. In the end, Valenti argues that the health and well-being of women are too important to be left to ideologues bent on vilifying feminism and undermining women's autonomy.

items.title: MOOC Fellowship - The Future Of Storytelling
items.description:
Because Youtube is banned in Pakistan we uploaded the videos once more to Vimeo. Talk about "things you tend to forget when planning a MOOC"

The MOOC is real, thanks to your votes! :)
https://iversity.org/courses/the-future-of-storytelling
Enroll to explore the future of storytelling together.

See the new preview trailer here:
https://vimeo.com/77241097

Follow us on Twitter and Facebook for more updates
@crossmedienne
@julianvandieken
https://www.facebook.com/TheFutureOfStorytellingMooc

Team:
University Of Applied Sciences Potsdam | Fachhochschule Potsdam
Prof. Winfried Gerling
Prof. Constanze Langer
Christina Maria Schollerer - www.crossmedienne.com
Julian van Dieken - www.vandieken.com
Bernadette Klausberger
and a whole list of supporters (see the end of the video)

This video is the application for the MOOC Production Fellowship of "iversity" and "Stifterverband für die Deutsche Wissenschaft" - which can be found here: https://moocfellowship.org/

Music: Brad Sucks - Dropping out of School

items.title: Why Open Education Matters
items.description:
A video we made about a topic close to our hearts - Open Education!

Blink Tower is a small team based in Cape Town, South Africa - and we love making explainer videos!

Feel free to share it, anywhere you like!

items.title: Flex Alert Program - Education "Community" :30
items.description:
With Southern California facing persistent drought, as well as the loss of a major power plant, government and utility energy managers felt an urgent need to remind consumers about what to do if the state called a "Flex Alert" - a warning of potential power shortages. Working under the direction of McGuire & Company, Brainchild developed the creative and the statewide media plan needed to deliver both awareness/education messages, as well as the actual notice of the need to take action.  Partnering with the amazing animation talents at Buck, our campaign revolved around a very simple, yet compelling, message: "the power is in all our hands."

Credits: 
Client: Wally McGuire / State of California
Exectuive Creative Director/Writer: Jef Loeb
CD/Art Director: Chris Chaffin
Executive Producer: Stephanie Heinsohn
Motion Graphics: BUCK Los Angeles (buck.tv)
Music: Sunday Morzeno (sunofz.com)
